mpa_description: Segments customers based on Recency, Frequency, and Monetary value of transactions. Produces 11 named segments from Champions to Lost.
Stratifies customers into 10 equal-sized groups based on value metric. Reveals concentration patterns.
Groups customers by acquisition period and tracks retention over time. Produces retention matrices.
Calculates customer lifetime value using historical averages. Formula: AOV x Frequency x Lifespan x Margin.
Statistical CLV model accounting for customer dropout probability. Produces confidence intervals.
Unsupervised learning discovering natural customer groupings based on behavioral features.
Predicts likelihood of target behavior using supervised learning.
Identifies customers most responsive to treatment using causal inference.
